title: Lipstick
description: The perfect shade of lipstick can lead to the perfect opportunity for sinâ€¦When living-challenged author Claire Presswood gets invited to go on a night out on the town with her two best friends, she isn't prepared for the evening that awaits her. Hungry and overworked, she arrives at a masked party at an art museum in time to meet debonair artist Maxwell Douglas. One look from his luminous eyes and Claire knows this will be a night to remember.
author: Erzabet Bishop
